ValidationRule.description: This will prevent Production Users from editing the Close Date and Anticipated Closing Date when Deal Stage is in Loan Processing, Underwriting, Approved by Committee, Closed Won, Expired or Matured
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED( CloseDate ), ISCHANGED( Anticipated_Closing_Date__c ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Loan Processing' ), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Underwriting' ), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Approved by Committee' ) ), OR( $Profile.Name= 'Origination Manager', $Profile.Name= 'Relationship Manager', $Profile.Name= 'Sales Analyst' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Close Date or Anticipated Closing Date can only be changed by an Operations Team Member in this Stage
